name: Goats Can Hear You
description:
This videogame has been developed in 48 hours during the V Edition of the Game Jam organized by GamesUPM (University Polytechnic of Madrid).

It is a game of terror and stealth. 

You are in an old mansion possessed by the devil and your only objective is to escape from there alive. 
Be careful with the goats, they can go through the paintings and they will chase you if you make noise. 
Hold your breath to be quieter, but don't run out of air! You are asthmatic, so running and dusty areas affect your breathing.

Controls
Movement: WASD
Interact: E
Run: Shift
Bend on: Control
Hold your breath: Space
